
   @font-face {

   li.nav-sections__list-item.is-background-01 {
margin-right: 0px;
}


@media screen and (min-width:992px){


li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant a:hover {
text-decoration: underline;
}


    .c-button-main-nav--close-desktop::before {
 
    border-color: transparent transparent transparent #a12528;
    background: #541317;
}

    .nav-primary__top-navigation ul li:last-child {
    top: -2px;
    position: relative;
}
    [data-css=c-header] .header__outer.is-region-02 .c-button-main-nav--default::before {
    background: #541317;
}
.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link {
    font-size: 0.8625rem;
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
}

}
[data-css=c-nav-primary] .nav-primary__region.is-region-01 {
    background-color: #541317;
}
[data-css=c-nav-sections] .nav-sections__list-item.is-background-01 {
    background-color: #541317;
    }
.c-button-main-nav--close-desktop, .c-button-main-nav--close-desktop .button-main-nav__button{
       background: #541317 !important; 
    }
.header__outer.is-region-02 {
    background: #541317 !important;
}
[data-css=c-header] .header__inner {
    max-width: 1280px;
}
[data-css=c-nav-primary] .nav-primary__wrapper {
    flex-flow: row wrap;
    max-width: 1280px;
}
li.lifestyle-slant.nav-sections__list-item{
    display:block;
}
li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant a {
    white-space: nowrap;
}
li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant {
    margin-right: 40px;
    background: #a50007;
    height: 62px;
    top: -1px;
    position: relative;
}
li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant >a:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
     border-style: solid;
    border-width: 0 40px 62px 0;
    border-color: transparent transparent #a50007 transparent;
    left: 100%;
    top: -23px;
    z-index: 1;
}


li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant > a {
    position: relative;
    text-decoration: none;
    display: block;
    position: relative;
    top: 23px;
}
li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant > a:before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    left: -40px;
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 0 40px 62px 0;
    border-color: transparent #a50007 transparent transparent;
    top: -24px;
}
li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant.insider {
    background: #6b040d;
}

li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant.insider > a:before {
     border-color: transparent #6b040d transparent transparent;
}

li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant.insider > a:after {
    border-color: transparent transparent #6b040d #6b040d;
}

li.nav-sections__list-item {
    margin-right: 7px;
}

@media screen and (max-width:767px){

.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item:last-child {
    margin-left: -20px !important;
    width: 110%;
}
    .c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item:last-child {
    background-color: #541317;
    margin-left: 0px;
}
    .c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item:last-child .nav-sections__list-item-link {
    border: none;
    left: 25px;
    position: relative;
}

    [data-css=c-nav-primary] .nav-primary__region.is-region-01{
background-color: #671e20;
    }
    li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant {
    display: block;
    width: 110%;
    left: -14px;
    position: relative;
}
li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant a {
    left: 20px;
}
    li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant >a:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 0;
    border-color: transparent transparent transparent transparent;
    left: 100%;
    top: 0px;
    z-index: 0;
}

    li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant > a {
    top: 0px;
}

    li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant {
    margin-right: 0px;
    top: 0px;
}

li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant > a:before {
    content: '';
    position: relative;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    left: 0px;
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 0px;
    top: 0px !important;
}
}

.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link {
       font-size: 15px;
    font-size: .9375rem;
}

li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant a {
    padding-left: 0px;
    padding-right: 0px;
}


@media screen and (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 992px){
[data-css=c-nav-sections] .nav-sections__list-item.is-background-01 {
    padding: 21px 41px;
}

li.nav-sections__list-item {
    margin-right: 0px;
}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1279px) and (max-width: 1365px){


    [data-css="c-header"] .header__inner {
    max-width: 1170px;
}
[data-css="c-nav-primary"] .nav-primary__wrapper {
    max-width: 1170px;
}
}


span.meta-navigation__icon.i-cna-938 svg {
    left: -3px;
}
[data-css=c-meta-navigation] span.meta-navigation__icon.i-watch-tv svg {
    position: relative;    
    left: -8px;
    top: 32px;
}



.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-cna-938 svg {
cursor: pointer;
filter: brightness(0) invert(1);
}


.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-watch-tv svg {
cursor: pointer;
filter: brightness(0) invert(1);
}


.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-watch-tv svg {
position: relative;
top: 2px;
left: 3px;
}




.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-watch-tv {
    padding-left: 0px;
    margin-right: 10px;
}

.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-cna-938 {
    padding-left: 0px;
    margin-right: 5px;
}
.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-cna-938 svg {
    top: 5px;
    position: relative;
}

.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-watch-tv svg {
    position: relative;
    top: 2px;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px){
.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-watch-tv {
    margin-right: 10px;
}
.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list-item-link .nav-sections__list-item-icon.i-cna-938 {
    margin-right: 7px;
}
[data-css=c-nav-primary] .nav-primary__region.is-region-02 {
    top: 0px;
}
}


@media screen and (max-width: 767px){


.c-nav-sections--main-navigation .nav-sections__list li:nth-child(5) {
border-bottom: 0px !important;
border: none;
}
}


@media screen and (min-width: 992px){
.nav-primary__top-navigation ul li:last-child 
{
top: 0px !important;
position: relative;
}
}


li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant.ninethree-eight {
background: #bd0d14;
}


li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant.ninethree-eight > a:before {
    border-color: transparent #bd0d14 transparent transparent;
}
li.nav-sections__list-item.lifestyle-slant.ninethree-eight > a:after {
    border-color: transparent transparent #bd0d14 transparent;
}
  
       .interactives-banner{margin:20px auto; padding:0; text-align:center;}
.interactives-banner a{border:none; cursor:pointer;}
.interactives-banner a img{width:100%; margin:0 auto;}
.interactives-banner .desktop{display:block;}
.interactives-banner .mobile{display:none;}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
.interactives-banner .desktop{display:none;}
.interactives-banner .mobile{display:block;}
}
      
       .cnaluxury-banner{margin:20px auto; padding:0; text-align:center;}
.cnaluxury-banner a{border:none; cursor:pointer;}
.cnaluxury-banner a img{width:100%; margin:0 auto;}
.cnaluxury-banner a video{width:100%; margin:0 auto;}
.cnaluxury-banner .desktop{display:block;}
.cnaluxury-banner .mobile{display:none;}

@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
.cnaluxury-banner .desktop{display:none;}
.cnaluxury-banner .mobile{display:block;}
}

.teaser-text.right {
position: absolute;
top: 0;
right: 0;
width: 45%;
color: #fff;
font-size: 1em;
font-family: Lato,sans-serif;
padding: 5% 10%;
height: 99%;
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(right, rgba(0,0,0,0.6), rgba(0,0,0,0));
background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0.6), rgba(0,0,0,0));
background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0.6), rgba(0,0,0,0));
background: linear-gradient(to left, rgba(0,0,0,0.6), rgba(0,0,0,0));
}


.teaser-text.left {
position: absolute;
top: 0;
left: 0;
width: 45%;
color: #fff;
font-size: 1em;
font-family: Lato,sans-serif;
padding: 5% 0 5% 15%;
height: 99%;
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(right, rgba(0,0,0,0), rgba(0,0,0,0.6));
background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0), rgba(0,0,0,0.6));
background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,0,0,0), rgba(0,0,0,0.6));
background: linear-gradient(to left, rgba(0,0,0,0), rgba(0,0,0,0.6));
}


.teaser-text h3 {
    font-size: 2em;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-family: Merriweather,serif;
    font-style: italic;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    margin: 0 0 20px 0;
}
.teaser-text .cta {
    display: block;
    clear: both;
    border-radius: 3px;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: .75rem;
    line-height: 1.25;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    max-width: 140px;
    margin: 20px 0;
    cursor: pointer;
    background: #a4191e;
    background: -webkit-gradient(left bottom,right top,color-stop(0,#a4191e),color-stop(100%,#620d0b));
    background: linear-gradient(45deg,#a4191e 0,#620d0b 100%);
    filter: progid:dximagetransform.microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#a4191e', endColorstr='#620d0b', GradientType=1);
}


#demo .carousel-control-next-icon, #demo .carousel-control-prev-icon {
display: inline-block;
width: 50px;
height: 50px;

}
.carousel-indicators{

display: none;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 768px){

#demo .carousel-item img {
max-width: 100%;
height: 400px;
}
.teaser-text.left, .teaser-text.right {
width: 70%;
padding: 15% 15% 0 15%;
height: 400px;
background: rgba(0, 0, 0, .7);
}
}
